tweet.text: In 1976, citizen Shultz played a critical role in the discussions leading the U.S. to host the G-7 summit in Puerto Rico. In #FRUS, Shultz discusses this economic summit with Secretary of State Henry Kissinger, CEA Chair Alan Greenspan, and others: https://t.co/RHCukysDL5 https://t.co/RylMhCQ1Uk
tweet.html: In 1976, citizen Shultz played a critical role in the discussions leading the U.S. to host the G-7 summit in Puerto Rico. In #FRUS, Shultz discusses this economic summit with Secretary of State Henry Kissinger, CEA Chair Alan Greenspan, and others: history.state.gov/historicaldocu…
